column5: Our resort does not have internet .Soafter we cross the boarder into rainy riverIs there anywhere we can pull over on a Saturday afternoon to take the random covid test if we get chosen to take the test. Any help will be appreciated.

Our group was 'lucky' last year to get test. We parked 50' from border crossing and did test there. We all had 3 different cell providers and had good signal there. I've crossed 4 times this year and have not got 'lucky' to get test this year.
I pull up to the west side of the Auto Parts store where the Switch Health drop box is. I've done it twice and everything worked fine for me. I have Verizon.
When were you last tested? I've crossed 3 times in July/August at Rainy so far and no tests. I'm wondering if they're still doing them.

my last time thru there the border guard had a box of test behind him, maybe 12-14 that said "weds test" looked like to me he was giving them to the first people that crossed that day, there was about 5-6 different people pulled over in the parking lot and just did it right there, thats what we did
Random tests are pretty darn rare at this point. But, you can pull over just past the border, take the test, and then drop it off in front of Kreger's.
Thanks, I just want to make things go as smooth as possible
